text: Yasmā ca kho bhikkhave saṅkhārā anattā tasmā saṅkhārā ābādhāya saṃvattanti na ca labbhati saṅkhāresu evaṃ me saṅkhārā hontu evaṃ me saṅkhārā mā ahesu nti
edit: Yasmā ca kho bhikkhave saṅkhārā anattā tasmā saṅkhārā ābādhāya saṃvattanti na ca labbhati saṅkhāresu – evaṃ me saṅkhārā hontu evaṃ me saṅkhārā mā ahesu nti

translations.transtext: Because, monks, mental formations [are] nonself, therefore mental formations exist for illness, and [one] does not obtain the mental formations thus, "May my mental formations be in this way, may my mental formations not have been in this way."
